turns.content:
This is a long response that spans many lines to test the compact mode truncation feature.

Line 1: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
Line 2: Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
Line 3: Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris.
Line 4: Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum.
Line 5: Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa.
Line 6: This line should be hidden in compact mode.
Line 7: And this one too.
Line 8: Still hidden.
Line 9: More content that should be truncated.
Line 10: The user should see the expand button to reveal all this content.
Line 11: Testing the fade gradient at the bottom of compact bubbles.
Line 12: Final line of the large content test fixture.
